Definition at line 126 of file vertex.h.

Vector nextlimit::rf_sdk::Vertex::getTextureCoordinates ( ) const [inline]

getTextureCoordinates:

Get the vertex's texture coordinates. Please notice that these texture coordinates ARE NOT the texture coordinates of the RealFlow object, they are just the texture coordinates you have assigned using the setTextureCoordinates function.

Returns:
: Texture coordinates
